name: Watch a Banana Simulator!
description:
Watch A Banana Simulator!

Watch a food item that is rich in potassium and vitamin C (Also known as a banana). Defend your banana against birds trying to obtain the banana. There is a total of a whopping 12 achievements in a game where you watch a banana!

When Playing on Browser, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO SAVE YOUR PROGRESS. ANY ACHIEVEMENT YOU GET WILL NOT BE SAVED. Also, don't click quit, otherwise it will freeze the game.

Reviews:Banana 1:

I was so glad I got this game. I get to protect my brother and kill those nasty birds. Highly recommend this game. :)

Banana 2:

I stayed up all night to get all the achievements. I'm gonna go to bed now.

Banana 3:

Why am I constantly trying to get attacked by birds?

GET WATCH A BANANA SIMULATOR NOW!!!
